> Plot:
>
> Anything can happen on Nim&#039;s Island, 
> a magical place ruled by a young girl&#039;s 
> imagination. It is an existence that mirrors 
> that of her favorite literary character, 
> Alex Rover - the world&#039;s greatest adventurer. 
> But Alexandra, the author of the Rover books, 
> leads a reclusive life in the big city. 
> When Nim&#039;s father goes missing from their island, 
> a twist of fate brings her together with Alexandra. 
> Now they must draw courage from their fictional hero, 
> Alex Rover, and find strength in one another 
> to conquer Nim&#039;s Island.
>
